short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly block YouTube ad-blocker popups for uninterrupted viewing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your YouTube experience with the YouTube AdBlock Notification Blocker extension! Say goodbye to interruptions caused by ad-blocker popups on the YouTube website. Our extension works quietly in the background, seamlessly removing these notifications, ensuring you can enjoy uninterrupted content without any hassle.
